last_episode_to_air.name: To Whom Evil Is Done
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Christine and Terry get closer, Stanley Zale forces her to choose between the two men in her life. Billie forms her own plan to protect her family. Bobby and Danny trap Eric in a violent event that reaches Terry and Christine in an epic finale

name: The Divide
overview: The Divide is a 2014 legal drama that aired on WE tv. The first season consisted of eight hour-long episodes. It premiered on July 16, 2014. On October 30, 2014, the series was canceled by WE-tv.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A district attorney uncovers new evidence that prompts the reinvestigation of a sensational murder case.

episodes.name: The Way Men Divide
episodes.overview: A young D.A., out to make a name, goes after cases that may be connected to VIPs. Hoping to make an even bigger name for himself, he goes after cold cases that are not only connected to VIPs but important people who want them solved.

episodes.name: No Such Thing as Justice
episodes.overview: As the execution date looms, Christine and the Innocence Initiative staff scramble to prove a flaw in the case, while Adam plays every card he has in an effort to block them.

episodes.name: Facts Are the Enemy
episodes.overview: Christine's preoccupation with the Butler case makes it hard for her to focus on her impending bar exam, while Adam attempts to resolve his doubts by confirming Jenny Butler's eyewitness ID.

episodes.name: Never Forget
episodes.overview: Terry has difficulty re-entering society after his release. Adam chases down loose ends, while Christine finds herself unprepared for the most important test of her life.

episodes.name: I'm for Justice
episodes.overview: The Page family deals with Jenny's fate. Trey finds himself at odds with his father as he voices his own views about right and wrong. Christine reaches out to her estranged family for help as her investigation into Terry's case turns dangerous.

episodes.name: And the Little Ones Get Caught
episodes.overview: Adam is furious when he learns the truth about the Butler DNA evidence. While investigating his own murder case, Terry deepens his involvement with the wealthy Zale family. Clark's own investigation into Terry's case suddenly becomes dangerous.

episodes.name: I Can't Go Back
episodes.overview: It is now Terry's turn to help Christine. Adam wrestles with a decision that endangers his family and political future. Terry puts his freedom on the line when he goes in search of DNA evidence that will prove his innocence once and for all.

episodes.name: To Whom Evil Is Done
episodes.overview: As Christine and Terry get closer, Stanley Zale forces her to choose between the two men in her life. Billie forms her own plan to protect her family. Bobby and Danny trap Eric in a violent event that reaches Terry and Christine in an epic finale

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A district attorney uncovers new evidence that prompts the reinvestigation of a sensational murder case.
